title: Severed Ties
description: Jamison and Candi are finally moving forward, putting the last few months of mania behind them, but a knock at the club’s door could destroy it all.A woman Jamison hasn't seen in years is in trouble and needs his help. Along with her plea comes an abundance of lies and secrets, including one he never expected, threatening to poison everyone Jamison loves most.The road ahead is rocky and unpredictable. Can Jamison figure out what her final game is before it’s too late? Or will this woman weave her web of treachery and shatter his relationship with Candi completely?
author: Lena  Moore
